item.title: Indeed’s CEO shares the unusual question he’s been asking job candidates for 15 years: Apple or Android?
item.description: CEOs at TripAdvisor, StockX, Wisp, and CTA have their own make-or-break questions for job-seekers—like how many degrees separate the minute and hour h...

item.title: It hasn’t been this hard to find a used car since the height of COVID
item.description: Tariffs drive people away from new cars, creating a shortage on used car lots.

item.title: More U.S. consumers than last year say they prefer gas-powered vehicles over electric or hybrid
item.description: Tariffs are having a significant effect on consumers’ auto purchase decisions.

item.title: Why LVMH’s $1 billion Formula One bet is more than the average luxury partnership
item.description: As well as a timekeeper, Tag Heuer became the first title sponsor for the Monaco Grand Prix this year.

item.title: Menopause startup Midi Health launches a longevity platform for women who want to be ‘healthy grandmothers’
item.description: Longevity isn't just for men trying to live to 150.
